description: Customer cannot export their main workspace dashboard to CSV. They see 'Export failed: timeout' after ~30 seconds.
Several SSO users in the EU are failing to log in via SAML. Error banner says 'SAML assertion invalid or expired'.
User reports they are an editor on a workspace but cannot edit a dashboard. They can open it but see no edit controls.
Customer's export API integration started failing with HTTP 429 responses for export endpoints.
